thread.title: HITLIST: five things to do in Hong Kong in the next 7 days
thread.title_full: HITLIST: five things to do in Hong Kong in the next 7 days | South China Morning Post

title: HITLIST: five things to do in Hong Kong in the next 7 days
text:
WATCH breakthrough iPhone-shot indie film on transgender culture in LA, Tangerine

TASTE some out-of-the-ordinary Italian fare at Passione Ristorante Italiano 

MARVEL at the talent of 24-year-old musician/producer Harts, playing in Lan Kwai Fong on October 28

CATCH one of the world’s top conductors, Christoph Eschenbach , as he makes his debut with the Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra at the Cultural Centre Concert Hall, October 23 and 24 http://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/arts-entertainment/article/1870837/conduct... 

GET ready for Hong Kong’s hiking season with our guide to the latest gear trends
